name: Runners Paradise
description: Runners Paradise is a sports clothing store in the South End. The store has several spots, including in the fitting rooms, that could be used to display illustrations, drawings, and photographs and to make the space more attractive for customers.

name: Peter's wall
description: My building has a large wall without any windows right on Massachusetts Ave, and I'd like to make it available for graffiti artists to make cool paintings.

name: Gina's Sculpture Garden
description: I have a large front yard/garden in my property where could show the sculptures from creators in my neighborhood.

name: Purple Turtle
description: Bar in Union Square. It's a popular spot for new bands to play every weekend, and it has a number of large LCD screens inside of the space. Instead of using the screens to show TV and sports, we want to make them available to video artists to show their work on a rotating basis, and complementing the music events.
